landing.title: Welcome to the MAS App!
landing.subtitle: This application allows you to communicate with an intelligent agent easily and effectively.

form.title: Access the system
form.subtitle: Fill in the fields to continue

connection.positionQrCode: Place the QR Code in the center of the camera
connection.connectionError: We were unable to access the camera. Please check your permissions.

snackbar.qrMissingFields: Invalid QR code: missing required fields
snackbar.qrInvalidJson: Invalid QR code: incorrect JSON format
snackbar.ipRequired: Please enter the ContextNet network IP
snackbar.portRequired: Please enter the ContextNet network port

info.strong: You only need to type the message content!
info.text: The app automatically formats the full message using your connection data.

descriptions.askOne: Asks a question expecting one answer
descriptions.askAll: Asks a question expecting all registered answers
descriptions.achieve: Requests the agent to perform an action
descriptions.tellHow: Informs the agent how to do something (procedure)

examples.title: Practical Examples
examples.autoFormat: The app automatically sends the full formatted message

list.first: Choose the message type from the dropdown on the left
list.third: Use TELL to inform something to the agent
list.fourth: Use ASK ONE/ALL to ask questions
list.sixth: Use TELLHOW to teach the agent procedures

chat.title: MAS Chat
chat.agentFirstMessage: Hello! How can I help you today?
